TopicTitle: Need some help with placing deployables.

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! I'm loving the new expansion, however, I'm having some confusion with how to place down the science stations while landed on a celestial body. When I take out the equipment and put it in my inventory it goes in like normal, but when I go to put it on the ground, it doesn't show anything. I can take the equipment out of my inventory, but it doesn't give me any buttons or indications of how or where to place it down. If anyone could give some advice, I'd be appreciative.
 

-Cheers!
While it is in your Kerbal s inventory there is a small white icon in the bottom right of the item. Press that.
